modName: MUSIC and SOUNDS for SKYRIM ver 2_0
summary:
Hi everyone-I return;)
 Here is a new package music and sounds to Skyrim, better yet compiled ...

Czesc wszystkim -Powracam;)
Oto nowa paczka muzyki i dzwiekow do SKYRIMA, jeszcze lepiej skompilowana...
descriptionHtml:
Please endorse if you like it :)

[check to my nev mod for caves (textures) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25768

The new package includes everything, of course, the earlier version of my mod, also chose the best of sounds, and the effect is great :)


mod contains music and sounds in a very high quality ..
 even listen to good stereo should have a well-cast enter the atmosphere I wanted to play these modifications.

ALL MY MODS WORKS ANY VERSIONS THIS GAME [Dawnguard to) BECAUSE NO USES (ESP, ESM and BSA FILE) SOUNDS AND MUSIC GAME REPLACES AUTOMATICALY...

 All songs and sounds are adapted to the system currently does from stereo to 7.1!

90% of mod music I composed myself, and the rest are songs that are in the files of my game: applying from other games, and more-such as the Robin Hood or Beny Hill)

 Sounds interface \"composed\" the same version 1.5 and, of course, also have them here :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
NEW voices for FEMALE in Combat

New voices for female (noise-power hits, punches, blocks, damage and more)
 The sounds are more natural and varied (for powerful attacks recorded a special two-phase character sounds) now reflect the votes of the feelings of our hero! Once she is satisfied after an attack at other times tired and even depressed with the development of the action (when it receives a hit) also recorded a special sound for blocks, punches, there will also form once happy and other times tired of making the block) effects like punches I applied for everything in order to feel player were as realistic as possible ... (FOR ALL LANGUAGE)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
C UPDATE SOUNDS for FEMALE 1.1

In my opinion an interesting addition that adds feminine sounds during hiding or removing the female variety of weapons. (female version only) {woices type \"aaha, ehh, uhu, ohhh, aaa,heee - for all language:)]Update works with all my modifications, and of course more. It can also be used as an individual modification (like most of my modifications) ...

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

*******************************************************************************************************************
!!! B UPDATE for SOUNDS 1v3 !!!

It\'s a really big update - contains 34 new sounds to my modifications.
 cave, fort, mine, catacombs, Dwemer, interior, barrel, item, weapons-and -
 wind, rain;)
 Now, for example, the sniper mode (archer) during the turn we hear a heartbeat.
 I added too as you can see from the list to the underground sounds stylistically matched to the site as the climate improves gameplay, and combined with the music is getting sensational :)
 Weather effects also need to satisfy the most ....
WARNING - go to skyrim data/sound/fx/wpn/bow/fire - and delete (.wav) \"wpn_bow_fire_02.wav\" to  \"wpn_bow_fire_02\" (sorry;)
*******************************************************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
!!! SOUNDS of BIRDS for SKYRIM !!!

Turning the modification of about 35 - 40% of the sounds of birds in the game on a more realistic and high quality!
 The sounds of birds have been recorded in the Polish forests (Bieszczady) by my good friend who is a forester;)
 The modification is compatible with all of my previous modifications to music and sounds for the game, and can also be used as a standalone modification ....
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
RYMEMBER you Skyrim works better if uses [installers] options in \"wyre bash\"

MY OTHERS MODS

V740T beautiful dungeons - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25842#content
V740T beautiful caves - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25768

RECOMMENDED MOD   -- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24805#content  (Better Animal Footsteps )
RECOMMENDED MOD   -- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24630  (MORE Additional Player Voices for Skyrim )


Check the VIDEO bookmark, or paste the following link into your browser 

LINK to long demo only music -- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b3fT2ug3pT0&feature=youtu.be

LINK TO SMALL DEMONSTRATION (126mb)  --  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E2HFELjFjw8&feature=youtu.be

LINK to YOUTUBE - demo castles music (156mb) -- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_1i_1bqisHk&feature=relmfu

 And he added NOW WHAT\'S NEW

 MUSIC

 - If (a update) add three musics for discover locations...
--------------------------------------------------------------------
 - One piece of music played out during battles ...
 - Two pieces of music for the boss battles ...
 - Two pieces of music played during the tour cities ...
 - Two pieces of music to the ice caves ...
 - One piece of music to the caves ...
 - Three pieces of music to the underworld ...
 - Track game played out on the menu ... (I use this mod, and it downloaded the this page: Bravo for the author :)
 - Three pieces played in taverns ...

 sounds

 - Song of the Bird in the forest ...
 - Many sounds associated with water (splashing waterfalls, mills, dripping water, rain, and other ...)
 - Sounds played in a storm ...
 - Lots of sounds associated with fire (fires, torches, and other ...)
 - New sound blocking, weapon strikes, hiding or removing weapons ...

 TO LINK TO MY previous mod - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14502

**** LINKS TO LISTENING **** (my project for skyrim music)

BATTLE 6 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/9XoJq8WexXt/battle_5_for_music_of_skyrim

battle 1 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/1O3oObtTlDt/mus_combat_1._muzyka_bitewna_do_skyrim

battle 4 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/7sFu1LieQht/music_battle_2_for_skyrim

tavern music 1 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/2jM8Lf3RAFR/music_for_tavern_of_scyrim_part_1

castle imperial 2 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/7hCDjpOqTfJ/mus_castle_imperial_2._muzyka_do_zamku_w_grze_skyrim_opc.2

fort - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/5aJqOZKM7QD/mus_dungeon_fort_muzyka_do_fortow_w_skyrim

town day - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/522ZI2Euz35/mus_town_day_muzyka_tla_do_miast_w_skyrim

castle imperial 1 - http://vito74m.wrzuta.pl/audio/27ONuRM2oqv/mus_castle_imperial_1_muzyka_do_zamku_skyrim

(here not all my projecy this mod ofc.) Have fun;)

Mod works for me in the form of 16 April 2012 and there is no problem with it ..
 Please read the comments at the link above :)


Also look forward to your opinion here, especially people who, for the first time see what it looks like in the game ..

 How do you like the new version, it\'s also a vote please ..

 Greetings to all Mark
